name: Arrester Bolt
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
A powerful bolt of lightning shoots forth in a 120 foot long, 5 foot wide line. Every creature in the way must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, they take 6d6 lightning damage and are paralyzed until the start of your next turn.

A creature that takes damage while paralyzed this way can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, they are no longer paralyzed.
empower: Creatures can't make Constitution saving throws to end the paralysis early.
